data.system_settings: Samsung Galaxy J7 Prime ~ Android 7.0 Nougat
data.actual_result: Their data will never load unless you attempt to mention them, load them in the members list, or hold on their profile, exit the menu, and wait for several seconds
data.short_description: Member's data (nickname, roles, etc..) won't load if they are far up in the channel history you are viewing [Lazy Guild Only]
data.steps_to_repro: - Find a lazy server - Find a channel with a pretty long message history, ~70ish - Scroll up until you find someone you know has a colored name (with a role) or a nickname - Realize they aren't colored, nicknames aren't displayed, and their status is offline even if they aren't when you hold on their name or profile picture
